items.desc:
Wearer gains +@APPercentAmp@% Spell Power Amplification.

(All sources of Spell Power are @APPercentAmp@% more effective)
items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap

items.desc: The wearer gains +@CriticalStrikeAmp@% Critical Strike Damage.
items.name: Infinity Edge

items.desc: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by @AttackSpeedSlow@%.
items.name: Frozen Heart

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Light

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Talisman of Light

items.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToSilence@% chance to silence the target on-hit, preventing the enemy from gaining mana for @SilenceDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Hush

items.desc:
When the wearer falls below @HPThreshold@% Health, nearby allies are healed for @HealthRestore@ Health after a 2.5 second delay.

This effect can trigger once per combat.
items.name: Redemption

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Warden

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Warden's Mail

items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for @BanishDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Zephyr

items.desc: This champion starts combat with 30 additional mana.
items.name: Ocean Hex

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Mage

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Mages Cap

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Blademaster

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Blade of the Ruined King

items.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain +@AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
items.name: Zeke's Herald

items.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]
items.name: Thief's Gloves

items.desc:
Basic Attacks grant the wearer +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.
items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

items.desc: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals @Damage@ true damage to the caster.
items.name: Ionic Spark

items.desc: Reduces all incoming magic damage by @MagicReduction@%
items.name: Dragon's Claw

items.desc:
Wearer dodges all critical strikes.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Phantom Dancer

items.desc: Grants a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Trap Claw

items.desc: Loot goes here
items.name: Loot Bag

items.desc:
Place on a champion to create a one-star copy of them.

[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]
items.name: Neeko's Help

items.desc: When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect @DamageReflect@% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.
items.name: Thornmail

items.desc: +@Armor@ Armor
items.name: Chain Vest

items.desc: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by @ASSlowPercentage@%.
items.name: Iceborn Gauntlet

items.desc: @ChanceToSpellSteal@ chance to steal the enemy's spell and cast it
items.name: Spell Thief

items.desc:
Wearer is also an Assassin

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade

items.desc: This champion has an additional @DodgeChancePercent@% chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.
items.name: Cloud Hex

items.desc: +@AS@% Attack Speed
items.name: Recurve Bow

items.desc: The wearer's basic attacks deal an additional @CurrentHPPhysicalDamage@% of the target's Current Health as physical damage.
items.name: Giant Slayer

items.desc: This champion starts combat with an additional @AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Inferno Hex

items.desc:
Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target, dealing @BurnPercent@% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds and preventing 80% of healing for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Red Buff

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
  • Basic attacks and spells deal +@TraitMultiplier@% Damage
  • Basic attacks heal @TraitMultiplier@ Health on-hit
items.name: Hand Of Justice

items.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToShrink@% chance on-hit to decrease the target's star level by 1 for the rest of combat.
items.name: Cursed Blade

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, they cleanse negative effects and revive with up to @HealthRestore@ Health after a @StasisDuration@ second delay.

This effect can trigger once per combat.
items.name: Guardian Angel

items.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer restores @ManaRestore@ Mana.
items.name: Seraph's Embrace

items.desc: +@Mana@ Mana
items.name: Tear of the Goddess

items.desc:
Whenever the wearer kills or participates in killing an enemy, gain +@ADPerStack@ Attack Damage for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times. Starts with @StartingStacks@ stacks.
items.name: Deathblade

items.desc: +@MagicResist@ Magic Resist
items.name: Negatron Cloak

items.desc:
Wearer is also Glacial

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Frozen Mallet

items.desc: Basic Attack fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.
items.name: Runaan's Hurricane

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Yordle
Extra +10% Critical Strike Chance, +10% Dodge Chance

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Mittens

items.desc: +@AD@ Attack Damage
items.name: B. F. Sword

items.desc:
+@CritChance@% Critical Strike Chance
+@DodgeChance@% Dodge Chance
items.name: Sparring Gloves

items.desc: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for @Lifesteal@% of the damage dealt.
items.name: Bloodthirster

items.desc:
Extra %i:scaleArmor% +@Armor@
Wearer is also a Knight

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Knight's Vow

items.desc:
Wearer is also Glacial

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Frozen Mallet

items.desc:
Wearer is also an Inferno

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Inferno's Cinder

items.desc: Basic Attacks deal an additional @MaxHealth@% of the wearer's Maximum Health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.
items.name: Titanic Hydra

items.desc: Wearer is also a Hextech
items.name: Hextech Chestguard

items.desc:
Wearer is also a Berserker

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Berserker's Axe

items.desc:
Extra %i:scaleMana% +@Mana@
Wearer is also a Demon

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Darkin

items.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore @ManaPercentRestore@% of their Maximum Mana.
items.name: Spear of Shojin

items.desc:
Wearer is also an Assassin

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade

items.desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, the first target hit and up to @ExtraBounces@ nearby enemies are dealt an additional @Damage@ magic damage.
items.name: Luden's Echo

items.desc: It must do something...
items.name: Spatula

items.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks @ShieldValue@ damage for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari

items.desc:
Extra %i:scaleAP% +@AP@
Wearer is also a Sorcerer

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Yuumi

items.desc:
When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing @BurnPercent@% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds and preventing 80% of healing for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Morellonomicon

items.desc: Wearer gains +100% Attack Range.
items.name: Rapid Firecannon

items.desc: Wearer's Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToDisarm@% chance to disarm the target for @DisarmDuration@ seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.
items.name: Sword Breaker

items.name: B. F. Sword

The wearer's spells can critically strike.

items.desc: +@AP@% Spell Power
items.name: Needlessly Large Rod

items.name: Mortal Reminder

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc: Wearer's team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ maximum team size.
items.name: Force of Nature

items.desc: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after @CleanseICD@ seconds.
items.name: Quicksilver

items.desc:
Whenever the wearer kills or participates in killing an enemy, gain +@ADPerStack@ Attack Damage for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times. Starts with @StartingStacks@ stacks.
items.name: Deathblade

items.desc: Wearer regenerates @HealthRegen@% of their missing Health per second.
items.name: Warmog's Armor

items.desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals @Damage@ magical damage to @BouncesTooltip@ enemies.
items.name: Statikk Shiv

items.desc: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for @OmniVamp@% of the damage dealt.
items.name: Hextech Gunblade

items.desc: At the end of each planning phase this champion permanently gains @HPPerRound@ max health.
items.name: Mountain Hex

ability.desc: Garen spins his sword for @SpinDuration@ seconds, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies over the duration.
ability.name: Judgement

ability.desc: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy. It stops on the first target hit, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDurationPerSquare@ seconds per Hex traveled.
ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow

ability.desc: Brand launches a bouncing fireball at an enemy. This fireball will bounce to nearby enemies up to @MaxBounces@ times, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage each time it hits.
ability.name: Pyroclasm

ability.desc:
Swain transforms into demon form for @TransformDuration@ seconds.

While in demon form, Swain drains health from nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and healing himself for @ModifiedHeal@ over the duration for each enemy in range. At the end of the transformation, Swain sends out a Soul Flare, dealing @ModifiedSoulFlareDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies.
ability.name: Demonflare

ability.desc: Passive: Whenever Vayne Basic Attacks the same target 3 times, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ of her target's maximum health as true damage.
ability.name: Silver Bolts

ability.desc: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies therein.
ability.name: The Arclight Blade

ability.desc:
Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through.

It then returns to her, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ true damage to all enemies it passes through.
ability.name: Orb of Deception

ability.desc:
Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing 150 %i:scaleAP% magic damage.
There is a 25% %i:scaleCrit% chance that this spell will critically strike for 225 %i:scaleCritMult% magic damage instead.
ability.name: Five Point Strike

ability.desc: Anivia creates a large hailstorm that lasts for @StormDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration and slowing the attack speed of all enemies inside of it by @AttackSpeedSlow@%.
ability.name: Glacial Storm

ability.desc: Aurelion Sol breathes fire in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in the area.
ability.name: Voice of Light

ability.desc:
Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

His next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second.

Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.
ability.name: Rocket Grab

ability.desc: Braum puts up his shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, absorbing and stopping all incoming missiles and reducing his damage taken from that direction by @ShieldDR@%.
ability.name: Unbreakable

ability.desc: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocking up all enemies within for @KnockDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Rupture

ability.desc: Darius swings his axe in a circle, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and healing himself for @ModifiedHeal@ health for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Decimate

ability.desc:
Draven starts spinning an axe, granting him 150% %i:scaleAD% bonus physical damage on-hit on his next attack.

It will return to his location after striking the target and if Draven catches it, it will refresh the buff.

Draven can spin up to two axes at a time.
ability.name: Spinning Axes

ability.desc:
Elise transforms into a giant spider and summons @NumSpiderlings@ spiderlings to fight alongside her.

While in spider form, Elise gains @LifestealPercent@ bonus lifesteal. Spiderlings benefit from active Demon trait bonuses.
ability.name: Spider Form

ability.desc:
Evelynn deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to up to 3 nearby enemies, then teleports away.

This damage is increased to @ModifiedCritDamage@ against targets below @ExecuteThreshholdPercent@ health.
ability.name: Last Caress

ability.desc: Fiora enters a defensive stance for @BlockDuration@ seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Riposte

ability.desc:
Passive: Gangplank periodically places barrels near enemies.

Active: Gangplank shoots his barrels, causing them all to explode, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects.
ability.name: Powder Kegs

ability.desc:
Gnar leaps towards an enemy and transforms into Mega Gnar, throwing nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @RCCDuration@ seconds.

While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar gains @TransformHealth@ Health and @TransformAD@ Attack Damage.
ability.name: GNAR!

ability.desc: Passive: Graves' basic attacks deal 5% %i:scaleAD% bonus physical damage and hit all enemies in a cone in front of him. Graves applies on-hit effects to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Buckshot

ability.desc: Karthus channels for 2.25 seconds, then deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to @NumberOfTargets@ random enemies.
ability.name: Requiem

ability.desc: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks steal @ManaSteal@ mana from his target and grant him a @ModifiedShield@ damage shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Nether Blade

ability.desc: Katarina channels for @Duration@ seconds, throwing knives at @NumberOfTargets@ nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration and reducing healing by 80% to her targets for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Death Lotus

ability.desc: Kayle shields her @Targets@ weakest allies, making them immune to all damage for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Divine Judgement

ability.desc: Kennen summons a storm around himself for @Duration@ seconds, calling down lightning bolts on all enemies in the area every @TickRate@ second and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration. Each enemy struck by 3 lightning bolts is stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom

ability.desc: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent teammates, this damage is increased to @ModifiedIsolationDamage@.
ability.name: Taste their Fear

ability.desc: Kindred creates a zone around themselves for @Duration@ seconds that prevents allies within from dropping below @MinHealth@ health or dying.
ability.name: Lamb's Respite

ability.desc: Leona calls down a solar ray in an area, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies within and stunning the enemy in the center for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Solar Flare

ability.desc:
Lissandra encases an enemy in ice, stunning them for @EnemyStunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in the surrounding area.

If she is below @SelfUltPercentage@ health, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable for @SelfDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in the surrounding area.
ability.name: Frozen Tomb

ability.desc: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then Basic Attacks them and fires a second shot which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Relentless Pursuit

ability.desc: Lulu makes @Targets@ allies giant, granting them @ModifiedBonusHealth@ bonus health and knocking up adjacent enemies near them for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Wild Growth

ability.desc: Miss Fortune channels and fires waves of bullets in a cone for @ChannelDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies within over the duration.
ability.name: Bullet Time

ability.desc: Mordekaiser slams his mace on the two spaces in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies within.
ability.name: Obliterate

ability.desc:
Morgana fires chains to all nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.

After @ChainDuration@ seconds, all chained enemies still within range of Morgana are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds and take @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage again.
ability.name: Soul Shackles

ability.desc:
Nidalee heals herself and an ally, restoring @ModifiedHeal@ health over @HoTDuration@ seconds, then transforms into cat form.

While in cat form, Nidalee's range is reduced to 1 hex and she gains @ADinCougar@ Bonus Attack Damage.
ability.name: Primal Surge

ability.desc: Poppy creates a shockwave in a straight line that can hit up to @NumberOfTargets@ enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, knocking up and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Keeper's Verdict

ability.desc: Pyke leaves an afterimage at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After @StunDelay@ second, his afterimage returns to Pyke, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Phantom Undertow

ability.desc:
Rek'Sai burrows, becoming untargetable for @BurrowDuration@ second and healing for @ModifiedHeal@ health.

She emerges at her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocking them up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Burrow

ability.desc:
Rengar leaps to and stabs the weakest enemy, dealing @LeapDamage@ physical damage and applying on-hit effects to his target.

After this leap, Rengar gains @ASBuffPercent@ Attack Speed and @CritBuffPercent@ Critical Strike Chance for the next @BuffDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Savagery

ability.desc: After a @ExplosionDelay@ second delay, Sejuani creates a glacial prison on an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemeis and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Glacial Prison

ability.desc: Shen creates a zone around himself for @ZoneDuration@ seconds, granting all nearby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming basic attacks.
ability.name: Spirit's Refuge

ability.desc:
Shyvana dashes away from her current target and transforms into dragon form.

While in dragon form, Shyvana's Basic Attack becomes ranged, she gains @ADWhileDragon@ Attack Damage, and her Basic Attacks burn her enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Dragon's Descent

ability.desc:
Tristana places a bomb on her current target which will detonate after she Basic Attacks them 3 times or @ExplosiveChargeDuration@ seconds pass without Tristana attacking them.

When the bomb detonates, it deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies, plus @PercentDamageIncrease@ for each Basic Attack, up to a maximum of @ModifiedMaxDamage@.
ability.name: Explosive Charge

ability.desc: Varus channels for 1.5 seconds, then fires a piercing arrow, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in its path.
ability.name: Piercing Arrow

ability.desc: Veigar blasts an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If Veigar is a higher star level than his target they are instantly killed instead.
ability.name: Primordial Burst

ability.desc: Volibear empowers his attacks for the next 20 seconds, causing them to chain to up to 3 nearby enemies. These chains deal 80% %i:scaleAD% physical damage and apply on-hit effects.
ability.name: Thunder Claws

ability.desc: Warwick pounces on the weakest enemy, stunning them for @Duration@ seconds and striking them @Hits@ times, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. Each strike triggers on-hit effects and heals Warwick for 100% of the damage dealt.
ability.name: Infinite Duress

ability.desc: Yasuo stabs his sword into the two spaces in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and applying on-hit effects to enemies within. Every third cast, Yasuo instead throws a tornado in a line that travels @QEmpowerHexRange@ hexes and additionally knocks enemies up for @QKnockupDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Steel Tempest

ability.desc: Zed throws a shuriken in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in its path.
ability.name: Razor Shuriken

ability.desc:
Twisted Fate randomly picks a card, then throws it at his current target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and creating a special effect based on the color of the card.

Blue: Restores @BlueCardManaRestore@ mana to all allies adjacent to Twisted Fate.
Red: Deals @ModifiedDamage@ to all enemies adjacent to the target.
Gold: Stuns the target for @GoldCardStunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Pick a Card

ability.desc:
Passive: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units.

After her first takedown, Jinx gains @PercentAttackSpeed@ bonus Attack Speed.

After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her Basic Attacks to deal @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.
ability.name: Get Excited!

ability.desc: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocks them up for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Assault and Battery

ability.desc:
Camille singles out and leaps on an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and rooting them for @Duration@ seconds.

Allies within range will prioritize attacking Camille's target.
ability.name: The Hextech Ultimatum

ability.desc:
Jayce knocks a nearby enemy away, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @CCDuration@ seconds. He then transforms into cannon form and gains max attack speed for his next @AAMax@ Basic Attacks.

While in cannon form, Jayce's Attack Range is increased by 3 hexes.
ability.name: Transform Mercury Cannon

ability.desc:
Pantheon leaps in the air, crashing down towards the farthest enemy, stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Enemies in Pantheon's path take @ModifiedDamage@ of their Maximum Health as magic damage. They then burn for an additional @BurnPercent*100@% of their Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds, reducing healing by 80%.
ability.name: Grand Starfall

ability.desc: Kai'Sa dashes to the furthest enemy unit, gaining +@ASPercent*100@% Attack Speed and a shield that blocks @ModifiedShield@ damage for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Killer Instinct

traits.desc:
Basic Attacks from Demons have a @ManaDrainProcChance@% chance to reduce their target's Mana by @ManaDrainBurn@ and restore Mana to the Demon.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaDrainDrain@ Mana restored
traits.name: Demon

traits.desc:
Basic Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun their target for @StunDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Stun
traits.name: Glacial

traits.desc:
Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Dodge
traits.name: Yordle

traits.desc:
Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 Health to fight alongside your allies
traits.name: Elementalist

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons gain @MagicReduction@% resistance to Magic Damage</row>
traits.name: Dragon

traits.desc:
All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked
traits.name: Knight

traits.desc:
Every @ProcRate@ seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for @ProcRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% chance
traits.name: Ranger

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, an ally Hextech launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for @DisableDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius
(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius
traits.name: Hextech

traits.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus Maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Bonus Health
traits.name: Brawler

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, select allies gain +@Armor@ Armor, +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance, and heal @Heal@ Health on-hit.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Ally
(@MinUnits@) All Allies
traits.name: Noble

traits.desc:
Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
traits.name: Ninja

traits.desc:
Blademaster Basic Attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Four Additional Attacks
traits.name: Blademaster

traits.desc:
Shapeshifters gain bonus Maximum Health when they transform.

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health
traits.name: Shapeshifter

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, Guardians grant +@Armor@ Armor to adjacent allies (this bonus can stack any number of times)</row>
traits.name: Guardian

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the end of each combat against another player, a treasure chest spawns on your arena containing up to 4 gold</row>
traits.name: Pirate

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, select Imperials are empowered to deal double damage.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Imperial
(@MinUnits@) All Imperials
traits.name: Imperial

traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full Mana
traits.name: Robot

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random enemy's Health is set to @HPToSet@</row>
traits.name: Phantom

traits.desc:
Select allies' Basic Attacks are empowered to grant +@AttackSpeedPercent@% Bonus Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times).

(@MinUnits@) Wild Allies Only
(@MinUnits@) All Allies, and allies' basic attacks cannot be dodged.
traits.name: Wild

traits.desc:
Gunslinger Basic Attacks have a @ProcPercent@% chance to fire additional bullets at other enemies within range.

These bullets deal damage like Basic Attacks and apply on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
traits.name: Gunslinger

traits.desc:
Innate: Sorcerers gain double Mana from Basic Attacks.

All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) +@AP@% Spell Power
traits.name: Sorcerer

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum Health</row>
traits.name: Exile

traits.desc:
Basic Attacks and Spells from select Void champions deal true damage.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Void champion
(@MinUnits@) All Void champions
traits.name: Void

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance
traits.name: Assassin

ability.desc: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and reducing their healing by 80% for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds. Meanwhile, Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.
ability.name: Dance of Dread

ability.desc: Ashe gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds, and her Basic Attacks fire a flurry of arrows for @ModifiedADDamage@ physical damage.
ability.name: Ranger's Focus

ability.desc: Kha'Zix stealths and attacks the lowest health enemy, critically striking for @ModifiedDamage@ physical damage and gaining @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Arid Assault

ability.desc: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies therein.
ability.name: The Arclight Blade

ability.desc: Braum puts up his shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, absorbing and stopping all incoming missiles and reducing his damage taken from that direction by @ShieldDR@%.
ability.name: Unbreakable

ability.desc:
Annie summons Tibbers near her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all adjacent enemies. Tibbers fights for the rest of the round or until killed, dealing @ModifiedTibbers@ magic damage with each Basic Attack.

Annie can't gain mana while Tibbers is active.
ability.name: Tibbers!

ability.desc: Azir summons a Sand Soldier near a random enemy. Sand Soldiers attack nearby enemies whenever Azir attacks, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage in a line, and last @SoldierDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Arise!

ability.desc: Diana creates @Orbs@ flame orbs which rotate around her and explode for @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage when they collide with an enemy. She also shields herself for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, absorbing the next @ModifiedShield@ damage she would take.
ability.name: Flame Cascade

ability.desc: Dr. Mundo creates a toxic cloud around him for @Duration@ seconds. The cloud deals @ModifiedDamage@ + @HealthPercent@% of Dr. Mundo's maximum health as magic damage to nearby enemies each second, and heals him for @HealRatio*100@% of that value.
ability.name: Adrenaline Rush

ability.desc: Ezreal fires a shard of ice at the lowest-health enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and applying on-hit effects.
ability.name: Ice Shot

ability.desc: Ivern shields the lowest-health ally for @Duration@ seconds, absorbing the next @ModifiedShield@ damage.
ability.name: Triggerseed

ability.desc: Janna summons a Monsoon around her, healing allies for @ModifiedHeal@% of their max health over @Duration@ seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked back and stunned for @StunDuration@ second.
ability.name: Monsoon

ability.desc: Kog'Maw launches an acidic blob at a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Living Artillery

ability.desc: LeBlanc launches an ethereal chain at a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and, after a short delay, stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Ethereal Chain

ability.desc: Malphite charges to a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them into the air,  and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Unstoppable Force

ability.desc:
Malzahar summons @NumVoidlings@ Shadow Spawn, who hit for @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage each attack.

Shadow Spawn benefit from active Shadow trait bonuses.
ability.name: Shadow Swarm

ability.desc: Passive: After being damaged by an enemy spell, Maokai's next attack heals him for @ModifiedHeal@.
ability.name: Sap Magic

ability.desc:
Master Yi meditates, becoming untargetable for @MeditateDuration@ seconds and healing @ModifiedHeal@ of his max health over the duration.

After Master Yi finishes meditating, he gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage on hit for @BuffDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Meditate

ability.desc: Nami summons a massive tidal wave which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit, knocking up and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Allies hit are empowered, and their Basic Attacks deal an additional @ModifiedBoost@ magic damage for the next @AllyBuffDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Tidal Wave

ability.desc: Nautilus sends out a depth charge that seeks out his farthest enemy, knocking them up and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds. It also deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through.
ability.name: Depth Charge

ability.desc: Neeko throws a seed at a random target that explodes for @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage three times. Each explosion affects a bigger area than the last.
ability.name: Blooming Burst

ability.desc: Passive - Every three hits Nocturne's attack is enhanced, dealing damage and applying on-hit effects to all adjacent units. It also heals @ModifiedHeal@ of the damage dealt.
ability.name: Steel Blades

ability.desc: Olaf gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed, up to @LifeSteal*100@% Lifesteal based on missing health, and immunity to crowd control for the rest of the round.
ability.name: Ragnarok

ability.desc: Ornn breathes lightning in a cone, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies therein, and increasing their chance to be critically struck by @CritAmpPercent@% for the next @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Lightning Breath

ability.desc: Renekton swings his blade, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for @ModifiedHeal@ per enemy hit.
ability.name: Cull the Meek

ability.desc: Passive: Singed leaves a toxic cloud wherever he moves, poisoning enemies who stand in it for @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over @PoisonDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Poison Trail

ability.desc: Sion winds up for a moment, then smashes his axe down in a direction, knocking up and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Decimating Smash

ability.desc: For the next @Duration@ seconds, Sivir's attacks bounce up to @NumBounces@ times, dealing @DamageCalc@ physical damage to enemies hit and applying on-hit effects.
ability.name: Ricochet

ability.desc: Skarner gains a shield against @ModifiedShield@ damage for @Duration@ seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains @AttackSpeed*100@% attack speed.
ability.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton

ability.desc: Syndra conjures a sphere of water which explodes near a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Hydro Sphere

ability.desc: Taliyah causes the ground to erupt under the enemy with the most mana, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to them, and stunning them briefly. This also knocks ranged enemies away, or pulls melee enemies closer.
ability.name: Seismic Shove

ability.desc: After a @InitialDelay@ second delay, Taric pulses cosmic energy onto allied champions within @HexRange@ hexes, making them invulnerable for @InvulnDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Cosmic Radiance

ability.desc: Twitch gains infinite range and has @BonusADDamage@ Attack Damage for @Duration@ seconds. During this time his attacks travel their full range and hit every enemy they pass through. This also applies on-hit effects.
ability.name: Spray and Pray

ability.desc:
Yorick blesses his @NumAlliesToTarget@ lowest-health allies (except Minions of Light). When they die they are resurrected as a Minion of Light with @GhoulHealth@ health and @ModifiedAD@ attack damage.

Minions of Light benefit from active Light trait bonuses.
ability.name: Shepherd of Souls

ability.desc: Zyra summons @NumPlants@ Flame Spitters at random locations on the edge of the arena. They attack the nearest enemy for @PlantDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per attack a total of @PlantAmmo@ times.
ability.name: Rampant Growth

ability.desc: Rek'Sai bites an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ true damage.
ability.name: Furious Bite

ability.desc: Varus channels for 1.5 seconds, then fires a piercing arrow, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in its path.
ability.name: Piercing Arrow

ability.desc: Passive: Whenever Vayne Basic Attacks the same target 3 times, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ of her target's maximum health as true damage.
ability.name: Silver Bolts

ability.desc: Veigar blasts an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If Veigar is a higher star level than his target they are instantly killed instead.
ability.name: Primordial Burst

ability.desc: Volibear bites his target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If the target is below @ExecuteThreshold*100@% health, Frenzied Bite kills the target and fully restores Volibear's mana.
ability.name: Frenzied Bite

ability.desc: Warwick pounces on the weakest enemy, stunning them for @Duration@ seconds and striking them @Hits@ times, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. Each strike triggers on-hit effects and heals Warwick for 100% of the damage dealt.
ability.name: Infinite Duress

ability.desc: Yasuo blinks to the enemy with the most items and knocks them up, holding them airborne for @StunDuration@ seconds and hitting them @NumHits@ times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.
ability.name: Last Breath

ability.desc:
Zed creates a clone of himself behind his current target.

This clone inherits its creator's items, stats, and current health, and can cast Living Lightning. Its mana cost is @ManaCostIncrease@ higher.
ability.name: Living Lightning

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc:
Lux fires an elemental blast dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a line.

If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded @ManaRefund@ mana.
ability.name: Final Spark

ability.desc: Qiyana blasts a short line in front of her, stunning enemies for @CCDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Elemental Blade

ability.desc: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for @Duration@ seconds, then strikes all nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Counter Strike

ability.desc: Nasus surrounds himself in light for @Duration@ seconds, gaining @ModifiedBonusHealth@ maximum health and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to adjacent enemies every second.
ability.name: Fury of the Dawn

ability.desc: Vladimir deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to the target and heals for the same amount.
ability.name: Drain

ability.desc: Thresh throws his lantern to the lowest-health ally, shielding them and nearby allies against @ModifiedShield@ damage for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Deep Sea Lantern

ability.desc: Qiyana blasts a short line in front of her, stunning enemies for @CCDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Elemental Blade

ability.desc: Qiyana blasts a short line in front of her, stunning enemies for @CCDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Elemental Blade

ability.desc: Qiyana blasts a short line in front of her, stunning enemies for @CCDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Elemental Blade

ability.desc: Soraka calms the area around a random enemy for @ZoneDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies standing in it and preventing them from gaining mana.
ability.name: Equinox

ability.desc: Qiyana blasts a short line in front of her, stunning enemies for @CCDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Elemental Blade

ability.desc: Brand launches a bouncing fireball at an enemy. This fireball will bounce to nearby enemies up to @MaxBounces@ times, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage each time it hits.
ability.name: Pyroclasm

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below @HPThreshold@% health.</row>
traits.name: Predator

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Berserkers leap to the nearest enemy.

When Berserkers attack, they have a @ProcChance@% chance to hit all units in a cone in front of them and apply on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
traits.name: Berserker

traits.desc: Innate: Alchemists ignore collision and never stop moving.
traits.name: Alchemist

traits.desc:
Crystal Champions have a maximum amount of damage they can take from a single hit.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageThreshold@ Max Damage
traits.name: Crystal

traits.desc:
Every @ProcRate@ seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for @ProcRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% chance
traits.name: Ranger

traits.desc:
Steel Champions gain damage immunity for a few seconds when they are reduced below @HealthPercentThreshold@% health.

(@MinUnits@) @ImmunityDuration@ seconds of immunity
traits.name: Steel

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random Woodland Champion makes a copy of themselves</row>
traits.name: Woodland

traits.desc:
All allies gain Magic Resistance.

(@MinUnits@) +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance
traits.name: Mystic

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance
traits.name: Assassin

traits.desc:
Summoned units gain bonus health and last longer.

(@MinUnits@) +@SummonDurationBoost@% health and summon duration
traits.name: Summoner

traits.desc:
Innate: Having an Avatar on your bench or board transforms all other Avatars in your shop to the Element of that Avatar.

(1) An Avatar's Origin Element is counted twice for Trait bonuses
traits.name: Avatar

traits.desc:
All allies gain mana every @TickRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) +@ManaPerTick@ mana
traits.name: Ocean

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Druids regenerate @HealAmount@ health each second.</row>
traits.name: Druid

traits.desc:
Wardens gain Armor.

(@MinUnits@) +@ArmorPercentIncrease@% Armor
traits.name: Warden

traits.desc:
Mages have a chance, when casting, to Doublecast instead.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance
traits.name: Mage

traits.desc:
Inferno spell damage burns the ground beneath the target, dealing a percentage of that spell's pre-mitigation damage over @ZoneDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) +@PercentBonusDamage@% damage
traits.name: Inferno

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random ally gains a @ShieldValue@ health Stoneshield.</row>
traits.name: Mountain

traits.desc:
All allies gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% dodge chance
traits.name: Cloud

traits.desc:
Shadow Champions deal increased damage for @Duration@ seconds at combat start and every time they get a takedown.

(@MinUnits@) +@DamageAmp@% damage
(@MinUnits@) +@DamageAmp@% damage, refreshed for any Shadow champions' takedowns
traits.name: Shadow

traits.desc:
Electric Champions shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.

(@MinUnits@) @Damage@ damage
traits.name: Electric

traits.desc:
Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Three Additional Attacks
traits.name: Blademaster

traits.desc:
Reduces each enemy's Armor.

(@MinUnits@) @ArmorPercentReduction@% Armor reduction
traits.name: Desert

traits.desc:
When a Light Champion dies, all other Light Champions gain Attack Speed and recover @HealAmount@% of the dying champion's maximum health.

(@MinUnits@) +@AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed
traits.name: Light

traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Poison Champions apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the mana cost of the target's spell by @CostIncrease@%</row>
traits.name: Poison

traits.desc:
Basic Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun their target for @StunDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Stun
traits.name: Glacial
